import React from 'react'; import styles from '../../styles/Post.module.css'; import { useCurrentUser } from '../../contexts/CurrentUserContext'; const Post = (props) => { const { id, owner, profile_id, profile_image, comments_count, like_id, title, content, image, updated_at, postPage, } = props; const currentUser = useCurrentUser(); const is_owner = currentUser?.username === owner return {owner}
{updated_at} {is_owner && postPage && "..."}
} export default Post
